borrow(uint256).details: Allows a user to borrow tokens against the deposited collateral.

params.amount: The amount of depositToken to borrow.

calculateInterest(uint256,uint256).details: Calculates the interest on the borrowed amount.

params.borrowTimestamp: The timestamp when the loan was taken.

constructor.details: Constructor initializes the contract with the LP token and deposit token addresses.

deposit(uint256).details: Allows a user to deposit the specific token for lending. The deposit is locked for the specified lock period.

params.amount: The amount of depositToken to deposit.

depositCollateral(uint256).details: Allows a user to deposit LP tokens as collateral.

params.amount: The amount of LP tokens to deposit.

liquidate(address).details: Liquidates the collateral if the loan value exceeds the liquidation threshold.

params.user: The address of the user whose loan is to be liquidated.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

repay(uint256).details: Allows a user to repay the borrowed tokens with interest.

params.amount: The amount of depositToken to repay.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(uint256).details: Allows a user to withdraw their deposited tokens after the lock period.

params.amount: The amount of depositToken to withdraw.
